description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Smouldering Skies is an old school top down shooter with fast paced game play, weapon upgrades, lush 3D rendered backgrounds and an array of unique bosses. Battle your way through hordes of enemies then defeat their master to move onto the next stage!
description.short: Smouldering Skies is an old school top down shooter with fast paced game play, weapon upgrades, lush 3D rendered backgrounds and an array of unique bosses. Battle your way through hordes of enemies then defeat their master to move onto the next stage!
